thread.title: Rangers in playoffs, near AL West title after edging Angels
thread.title_full: Rangers in playoffs, near AL West title after edging Angels

title: Rangers in playoffs, near AL West title after edging Angels
text:
> Texas Rangers in playoffs, near AL West title after edging Angels Texas Rangers' Adrian Beltre (29) follows through on a bases clearing double that came off a pitch from Los Angeles Angels' Andrew Heaney in the fifth inning of a baseball game Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015, in Arlington, Texas. Angels catcher Carlos Perez watches the hit. (AP Photo/Tony Gutierrez)
